concept.title: 5819.705-6 Postaward Responsibilities of the Contracting Officer

conbody.p: (a) Email a signed copy of the subcontracting plan to the relevant Area SBA PCR and the SBA Area Director, Office of Government Contracting where the contract will be performed, with a copy to: disa.meade.osbp.mbx.ditco-small-business-office@mail.mil . (Note: For assistance in determining the SBA Area Director, see https://www.sba.gov/federal-contracting/counseling-help/contracting-area-directors.)
